when.test: date != null and weatherAbbr != null and windPower != null and aqi != 0

choose.when: insert into weather(city_name, date, max_temp, min_temp, weather_abbr, wind_power, aqi, fcd) values (#{cityName}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{maxTemp}, #{minTemp}, #{weatherAbbr}, #{windPower}, #{aqi}, now())

mapper.select: select count(1) from (select distinct city_name from weather where city_name = #{cityName}) as wcn
select count(1) from (select city_name from weather where city_name = #{cityName} and date = #{date}) as wcn
